page.title: 13Traffic Survey in Nuthall
page.content: A Survey of the A610 By-pass:- We went to the bypass at lunch time on Monday, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday in one week. We watched the road and counted the traffic. We found that Monday was the busiest day and Wednesday the quietest. On each day cars were seen most often and lorries second most often. Vans were also common. One or two motor cycles were seen each day. Coaches travelling South were seen on Thursday, Friday and Monday. On Tuesday we saw one coach going North. Only two bicycles were seen, one going North, the other South. They were seen on Monday and Friday. Only one service bus was seen. It was going South on Wednesday. There was more traffic travelling North every day except on Friday. Pedestrians were only seen on the footbridge, never on the busy dual carriageway itself.
